entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 then north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
